Chapter lead & Squad lead Role for Cloud Operations Team

The Cloud Operations Chapter Lead and Squad Lead will be responsible for leading and managing the cloud operations team, ensuring the efficient and reliable operation service in  cloud infrastructure (AWS,Azure,GCP), and delivering exceptional service to high-demand customers (External markets)

Key Responsibilities :-

Develop and implement cloud operations strategy aligned with business goals.
Lead and mentor a team of cloud operations professionals.
Oversee cloud infrastructure design, implementation, and maintenance.
Manage cloud operations, ensure security and compliance, and optimize resource utilization.
Promote automation and DevOps practices.
Manage stakeholder relationships, engage with customers, and collaborate with team members.
Close collaboration with business development team and customers for new customer acquisition
Demonstrate strong technical expertise, problem-solving skills, and self-resilience
